entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -22.7°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
